name: Space Game (redstonecreeper8)
description:
This is the first  "game" I  made, I just started working on it a few days ago. The idea for the game is for it to be kind of like Terraria or The Legend of Zelda except to get to new areas you have to fly to them in your rocketship. Right now I just have 2 planets you can land on and nothing really to do there, but I wanted to see if anyone thought this concept would even be fun. Also the transition when you go from the overworld map to each planet is really janky because each planet has a flat tilemap to play on an a circular version that you can orbit and your rotation and velocity has to be converted between the two. I thought maybe someone would know how to fix that, I'm not good at math. Anyways, thanks for checking it out! :)

Controls

WASD - movement

stand in front of the rocket and click it to get on

A and D turn the rocket, Space controls the engine

Scroll wheel - when in space this zooms the camera in and out

Up and down arrow keys - these control the speed of time. The current speed is in the top left corner.
